name: Xtreme Car Destruction League
description:
Devbatch presents Xtreme Car Destruction League 2017 - A Racing game for action lovers. Turn on your nitro and destroy all your opponents. The craziest driving destruction and war of all time. Select variety of car, jeeps in the league and win the battle of Cars.

Select fun & challenging theme such as War ship, Hanging mountaions, island. Enjoy demolition derby xtreme racing with car death power. Unleash your car driving skills for extreme level with furious and recklessness driving. You can perform extreme sports car stunts in this car war game. Several gameplay levels with demolition derby xtreme car driving and 3d stunts.

Xtreme Car Destruction League 2017 Features: 
- Daring full speed racing that needs adventure
- Crash the opponent car
- Variety of Amazing cars and Opponents
- Real Driving race of cars
- Easy to play
- Can play without internet
- HD racing graphics
and many more
